thread.title: 22 Best Moments From The Oscar Awards
thread.title_full: The 22 Best Moments From The 2017 Oscar Awards

author: Lauren Yapalater
title: 22 Best Moments From The Oscar Awards
text:
View this image ›
ABC / Via giphy.com ID: 10602321 2. Nicole Kidman clapped. View this image ›
ABC ID: 10602331 3. Ryan Gosling was bewildered by candy parachutes. View this image ›
ABC / Via giphy.com ID: 10602302 4. While Andrew Garfield was a pro at catching them. View this image ›
ABC ID: 10602961 5. Taraji P. Henson was very happy about her Twizzlers. View this image ›
ABC ID: 10602306 6. And then wanted to make sure if Octavia Spencer was sharing her goods. View this image ›
ABC ID: 10603166 7. Seth Rogen wore the Back To The Future shoes while presenting with Marty McFly himself. View this image ›
ABC / Via giphy.com ID: 10602300 8. Auli’i Cravalho from Moana didn’t let a little cloth interference bring her down. View this image ›
ABC ID: 10602333 9. Meryl Streep got a standing ovation to prove that she’s not overrated. View this image ›
ABC / Via giphy.com ID: 10602721 10. Matt Damon tripped Jimmy Kimmel. View this image ›
ABC / Via giphy.com ID: 10602683 11. So then Jimmy Kimmel tried to play him off. ABC / Via buzzfeed.com
ABC / Via buzzfeed.com
 ID: 10602882 12. Justin Timberlake danced with his wife, Jessica Biel. View this image ›
ABC / Via giphy.com ID: 10602932 13. And also crept on Emma Stone. View this image ›
ABC / Via giphy.com ID: 10603128 14. Viggo Mortensen’s son gave him a kiss. View this image ›
ABC ID: 10603195 15. A group of tourists were surprised with being on live TV, so naturally this guy (Gary!) kissed Nicole Kidman’s hand… View this image ›
ABC / Via giphy.com ID: 10602313 16. …Ryan Gosling whispered sweet nothings in this woman’s ear… View this image ›
ABC / Via giphy.com ID: 10602891 17. …And Denzel Washington officiated a quickie wedding between the couple. View this image ›
ABC / Via giphy.com ID: 10602796 18. And then finally, after a night of small bits and candy parachutes, came the biggest moment of the night. When Warren Beatty realized there was something off about his envelope… View this image ›
ABC ID: 10602660 19. But announced La La Land was the winner of Best Picture anyway… View this image ›
ABC / Via giphy.com ID: 10603093 20. And then realized that the real winner was Moonlight . ID: 10602769 21. Which was the twist ending that stole the entire show. View this image ›
ABC / Via baawri.tumblr.com ID: 10602786 22. And Janelle Monàe loved it. View this image ›
ABC / Via giphy.com ID: 10602914 23. Till next year! View this image ›
ABC / Via giphy.com ID: 10603202
